title: Proximate Relationship Timeline
tagline: Two weeks of living and breathing the startup life.
subtitle: The best way to spend winter break.
description: A month of winter break is far too long. To alleviate my boredom, I spent a little under two weeks working for a two-person web startup in Cambridge. Living with the two founders and learning web development, I picked up new technologies at a breakneck pace. Nine days after I started, I deployed a new feature for their webapp - an interactive chart in D3.js (using a Backbone.js framework) that pulls data from a Ruby backend, does some cleaning, and shows the user when new relationships were formed, in addition to a pre-existing networking graph showing who is connected to whom. If you're curious, head on over to www.proximate.com and take a look around.
